channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Denis Karani
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Denis Karani

item.title: Project VIII: Student Transportation Management Application
item.description: I developed and deployed a Student Transportation Management Application that offers a streamlined way for schools and transportation providers to manage student transport services efficiently. The application allows for real-time tracking, route optimization, and vehicle management to enhance the overall transportation experience. My key contributions included: Project Highlights: Application Design & Architecture Designed the overall architecture of the application using a microservices-based approach, leveraging Azure Container Apps for deployment and scaling.

item.title: Project VII: School Transportation Data Dashboard
item.description: I have successfully developed and deployed an Interactive School Transportation Data Dashboard that offers real-time insights into key performance indicators, including estimated and actual fuel consumption for school vans on a weekly basis. This dashboard helps schools optimize their transportation efficiency. My contributions and responsibilities for this project included: Project Highlights: Data Collection & Structuring I sourced transportation data, including fuel consumption and route performance, and structured it using Google Sheets integrated with MySQL for storage.

item.title: Project II: Python Project to Scrape YouTube using YouTube Data API
item.description: In the realm where technology and creativity intertwine, a groundbreaking venture emerges - a Python project meticulously crafted to unravel the secrets concealed within the vast ocean of YouTube data. Aptly named “Python Project to Scrape YouTube using YouTube Data API: Analyze and Visualize YouTube Data,” this endeavor embodies the fusion of innovation and expertise, offering a captivating glimpse into the realm of data analytics and visualization. Imagine delving into the labyrinthine corridors of YouTube, armed with nothing but code and curiosity.

item.title: Project I: Heart Disease Prediction Model
item.description: I have successfully developed and implemented a heart disease prediction model using Logistic Regression machine learning algorithm to determine whether someone has a heart disease or not. My responsibilities included: Dataset collection – heart disease dataset is collected using secondary means of data collection. Importing Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib and Seaborn libraries are to be used. Exploratory data analysis: For getting more insights about data. Data cleaning and preprocessing: Check for null and junk values using isnull() and isna().

item.title: Project VI: Comparative Analysis Dashboard
item.description: In the vast landscape of data analytics, where insights abound and decisions shape destinies, the Comparative Analysis Dashboard emerges as a beacon of clarity amidst the complexity. With its elegant design and robust functionality, this dashboard transcends the boundaries of traditional analysis, offering stakeholders a panoramic view of comparative metrics that illuminate pathways to informed decision-making. As the curtains rise, the Comparative Analysis Dashboard captivates with its first act: Comparative Performance Metrics.

item.title: Project IV: Northwind Dashboard
item.description: In the realm of data-driven decision-making, where every pixel holds a story, the Northwind Dashboard stands as a testament to the artistry and science of data visualization. With its three meticulously crafted sections - Overview, Category & Product, and Employee - this dashboard transcends the mundane and unveils a world of insights hidden within the data. At first glance, the Overview section beckons with its elegant simplicity. Like a panoramic view of a bustling metropolis, it presents a bird’s eye view of the Northwind dataset.

item.title: Project III: Sales Dashboard
item.description: In the fast-paced world of business, where every decision counts, having access to actionable insights is paramount. Enter the realm of data visualization, where Microsoft Power BI emerges as a beacon of innovation, empowering organizations to transform raw data into strategic intelligence. In this article, we embark on a captivating journey through the creation of a dynamic Sales Dashboard, showcasing the formidable capabilities of Power BI in unlocking the hidden potential within sales data.

item.title: Project V: HR Dashboard
item.description: In the heart of every organization lies its most precious asset: its people. In the dynamic realm of Human Resources, where the ebb and flow of talent meets the strategic imperatives of the business, the HR Dashboard emerges as a symphony conductor, orchestrating the harmonious blend of data and human capital management. With its intricate melodies of insights and its vibrant visualizations, this dashboard transcends the conventional boundaries of HR analytics, offering stakeholders a kaleidoscopic view of their organization’s most valuable resource.

item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to the digital realm where data transforms into insights, and decisions pave the way for innovation. Meet Denis Karani, a pioneering force in the world of data science, hailing from Murang’a University of Technology. With a relentless passion for unraveling the mysteries hidden within vast datasets, Denis emerges as a beacon of excellence, seamlessly blending the artistry of software engineering with the precision of data analysis to unlock the true potential of information.
